meaningMnemonic: To <kanji>fly</kanji> <kanji>into</kanji> something and "commit suicide" (自殺) is <vocabulary>suicide by train</vocabulary>. Unfortunately, this is a term you should probably be familiar with because it comes up from time to time on the news and around train stations. (Hopefully someday it will no longer be a term you need to know and we can remove it forever.)
readingMnemonic: The readings come from 飛ぶ, 込, and 自殺. Combine them together to read this entire word.
